segments.text: I wouldn't say that . It looks fine to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding She is behind the times . That style went out last year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , come on , as long as it looks good on her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you ’ re really as out-dated as she is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re darn right . I am out of style . So what What's the point of keeping yourself in style
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No wonder you never buy me a new dress .
segments.speaker: S1
